events.message: The applicant has submitted a personal loan request to cover medical expenses expected in the coming months, providing initial details and requested amount.
The loan application was reviewed by the system and categorised as a Personal Loan due to keywords related to medical and personal financial needs.
An experienced loan officer has been assigned to handle this personal loan application and to guide the applicant through the process.
The loan officer completed the initial review of the applicant’s documents and background information to verify eligibility and completeness.
Additional financial statements and medical bills were requested from the applicant to further evaluate the personal loan application.
The applicant submitted all requested documents, including recent bank statements and detailed medical invoices to support the loan request.
Credit bureau reports were obtained and processed, revealing the applicant’s satisfactory credit score with acceptable outstanding debts.
Comprehensive risk assessment considering credit score, debt-to-income ratio, and medical expense justification was finalized for this application.
A personalized loan offer outlining terms, interest rates, and repayment schedule was sent to the applicant for review and acceptance.
The applicant provided feedback expressing appreciation for the clear offer and requested minor adjustments in the repayment period.
The case was escalated to senior management to review the applicant’s request for extending the repayment term.
After thorough review and management approval, the personal loan application was approved with adjusted repayment terms.
The approved loan amount was successfully disbursed to the applicant’s bank account for covering medical expenses.
Loan officer contacted the applicant for follow-up to ensure satisfaction and provide assistance during the repayment period.
The loan application process was completed successfully and the file was closed with all documentation archived properly.
